text: ) Answer: 3 ) We will do IP A Subnet mask and see if we are getting same subnet ID or not and we will go for longest prefix match. So let's first check subnet 4 (200.150.68.118) A (255.255.255.224) = (200.150.68.96), subnet ID do not match Now let's check for subnet 3 (200.150.68.118) A (255.255.255.0) = (200.150.68.0), subnet ID matches so our packet will be forwarded to subnet 3
